item.title: belerick
item.description: × BELERICK HD Wallpaper ❮ ❯ Legends say, the Ancient Ones of the Land of Dawn trusted mystical creatures with grand tasks. ########Belerick, a member of the tree people, was one of this creatures. Belerick’s heart is filled with nothing but kindness—He absolutely hates conflict. Within his ancient self, Belerick possesses a strong life force that provides strong resistance against a attacks, but also allows him to reincarnate. Due to his kind nature, wherever there is conflcit, Belerick will be there to help the righteous and weak.
